timeline.bodyText: Is this artifact not in maven central? We shouldn’t be referencing third-party repositories in our Pom files. It makes it much harder for organizations that want or need to proxy maven through an internal maven proxy and it introduces potential instability in the builds when those third-party repos are unavailable.
timeline.author: martint
